pageTitle: Last Perl Forums Reviews | Forum Software Reviews
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1776=Demos are opened to anyone interesting in testing, experiencing and discovering forum software services and features. It however happens that an installation is messed up by a guest, so, in order to provide the best experience, these demos are automatically reinitialized twice a day, at 04:00 (GMT+1) and 16:00 (GMT+1).}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {87105=The famous Wordpress team, which has developed one of the best and used Blogg Tool is also developing since 2004 a forum software., 23925=Last update : April 28th, 2012.}
textBeforeTable: Additional Notes page. Demos are usually initialized with these accounts and passwords. However, this is not valid for demos that are not hosted here, or that require more secure passwords. Anyway, you will find valid logins and passwords on the Identifiers & Passwords You might find some features disabled in order to ensure the security of our test server. If such, these details are listed in the additional notes coming with the demo. You will see the following message replacing these disabled features. Forum Software Reviews. by Disabled for Security Reasons Disabled features This reinstallation is sequential and approximatively takes 15 minutes. Demos are opened to anyone interesting in testing, experiencing and discovering forum software services and features. It however happens that an installation is messed up by a guest, so, in order to provide the best experience, these demos are automatically reinitialized twice a day, at 04:00 (GMT+1) and 16:00 (GMT+1). Why Refreshing Forum Demos? Next Demo Refresh: Forum Software Demos 29046 reads
textAfterTable: moderator demo moderatordemo (1) (2): Logins and Passwords in italic are more uncommon but are sometimes used in order to fulfill software requirements (password too short, restricted user names,...).
